name: Stranded (itch) (AniMerrill Productions)
description:
Alone on a frozen mountaintop, you must find a way to beat the elements. Armed with only a trusty axe, build fires and explore to find any hope of ever making it back home alive...

________

This is an open source project made for the Godot Jam! I have builds for Windows, Linux, and Mac (although I haven't tested Mac at all and have no way of doing so) as well as the entire source project for the game. Feel free to glean what you can, it's a disaster but that's what happens when you code for 42 hours and sleep for 6. @w@

GD Jam Theme: Temperature

Credits:

  • AniMerrill, a.k.a. Ethan Merrill - Game Design, Art, and Programming
  • Jimmy "MullyWhiizz" Zagorsky - Music and Sound Design
